name: Aviation Maintenance Technical Workforce Grant Program
popular_name: Aviation Maintenance Technical Workforce Grant Program
objective: The goal of the Aviation Maintenance Technical Workforce Grant Program is to support education, recruitment, and development of the aviation maintenance workforce in accordance with the FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: FAA awarded 15 grants, totaling $5,000,000 to aviation maintenance technical workers recipients.
FAA awarded 11 grants, totaling $5,000,000 to aviation maintenance technical workers recipients.
FAA awarded 12 grants, totaling $9,000,000 to aviation maintenance technical workers recipients.

rules_regulations: PART 200 - UNIFORM ADMINISTRATIVE REQUIREMENTS, COST PRINCIPLES, AND AUDIT REQUIREMENTS FOR FEDERAL AWARDS
